summary.span: Contient des classes qui prennent en charge l’interopérabilité des contrôles Windows Forms et WPF.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le espace de noms contient des classes qui permettent l’interopérabilité entre le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Lorsque vous utilisez classes, vous pouvez héberger [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] contrôles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] éléments dans [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-en fonction des applications.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Les deux principales classes qui implémentent les fonctions d’interopérabilité sont et .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . La classe que vous utilisez dépend de votre implémentation de contrôle :Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Utilisez le classe lorsque vous devez utiliser un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control sur un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Utilisez le classe lorsque vous devez utiliser un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] élément dans un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-application basée sur.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
